about.description1: Hive Proposals is a budgeting system for Hive blockchain. HiveDAO.com is a basic UI that shows the latest proposals that entrepreneurs, companies and individuals publish to receive funding for projects that can help to grow and improve Hive DAO ecosystem.
about.description2: Worker Proposal System (HPS) was developed by a community member @blocktrades for community members and implemented during HF21. This website represents only one of the potential interfaces of proposals on Hive DAO blockchain.
about.description3: Hive DAO is supported by @dmitrydao, a front-end dev and a Witness.
about.subtitle: Some basic info on Hive DAO
common.originalPostDescription: An original post can be found here:
createProposal.creatorInputDescription: Creator is a Hive account that publishes a proposal
createProposal.dailypayInputDescription: HBD are Hive-backed dollars (1 HBD ~ 1 USD)

createProposal.permlinkInputDescription: Permlink is a URL for proposal description (Hive post), i.e. create-cool-app
createProposal.receiverInputDescription: Receiver is a Hive account that receives funding for proposal
createProposal.submitProposalTitle: Submit the form for your proposal to go live

dashboard.newsText: Support devs with your witness vote!
dashboard.subtitle: A list of the latest proposals submitted to the Hive network
dashboard.title: Hive DAO
faq.faqAnswer1: A worker proposal system allows Hive users to publicly propose work that they are willing to do in exchange for pay. Hive users can then vote on these proposals in almost the same way they vote for witnesses (stake weighted votes, but voters can vote for as many proposals as they want). The proposals that get a sufficient amount of vote weight get funded from a special Hive account controlled by the blockchain.
faq.faqAnswer2: The funding is generated from an extra inflation that was established during the hardfork 21, during which 10% of all newly generated tokens are going to steem.dao account.
faq.faqAnswer3: There's a 10 HBD fee that is charged before you submit a proposal. This prevents spamming and creation of projects with no value.
faq.faqAnswer4: Hive is a social blockchain that grows communities and makes immediate revenue streams possible for users by rewarding them for sharing content. Itâ€™s currently the only blockchain that can power real applications via social apps like PeakD.
faq.faqAnswer5: Hive.blog has redefined social media by building a living, breathing, and growing social economy - a community where users are rewarded for sharing their voice. It's a new kind of attention economy. Hive.blog is one of the many websites (including Engrave, 3Speak, etc.) that are powered by the Hive blockchain and HIVE cryptocurrency.

features.cta1Subtitle: Hive has helped dozens of entrepreneurs to create unique business models and attract thousands of active users to Hive-based applications.
features.cta1Title: It's time to change your life
features.cta2Subtitle: You never know how great your idea is until you make it happen. You can always go back to your job, you can't always make something worthwhile for the people around you. Don't wait.
features.cta2Title: It's time to create your proposal
features.processStem1Info: Make research on how you can help Hive blockchain to grow. You can start with your current skill set.
features.processStem2Info: Compose a detailed post about your proposal with milestones, deadlines and your team background.
features.processStem3Info: Submit your proposal to Hive blockchain. Engage with community to get enough votes and funding.
features.processStem4Info: Create what you envisioned. Share the results with Hive community. Improve and experiment.
features.recentProposalSubtitle: Check the most recent proposals to get inspired to create your own
features.subtitle: With Hive DAO you get financial, as well as professional support from the biggest blockchain community.
features.title: A modern way to fund your projects
home.subtitle: Hive allocates budget for talented entrepreneurs to grow its ecosystem. Have some skill or service to offer? Give it a chance.
home.title: Explore Hive DAO

proposals.returnProposalInfo1: Return proposal acts as a threshold you need to pass to start receiving funding.
proposals.returnProposalInfo2: Essentially, it returns money back to Hive Proposal System's account (@steem.dao).
proposals.returnProposalInfo5: It is advisable to upvote this proposal only if your goal is to increase the passing threshold. You can approve/remove your vote using the form below.
